Reviews.Title: Just a Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Julie Miller
Reviews.Content: last for about 9 months, and then blows a fuse in the converter box. rca knows about the problem. can be used as a monitor only now. what a piece of junk by thompson electronics, aka: rca.  Dont buy. Samsung or LG or Sony.jim

Reviews.Title: 9 - 14 month life span
Reviews.Author: Kevin "Kevin D."
Reviews.Content: RCA L46WD250 46-Inch LCD Scenium Flat HDTV  I agree with other review, mine lasted 14 months before power totally died. No sound no picture.  It started temporarily going out within 6 months of purchase.  DON'T BUY!

Reviews.Title: Totally a pile of expensive junk!
Reviews.Author: PastorLee
Reviews.Content: Paid $1,999.00 for it and had to be put into the repair shop in less than 1 week's use! Had to be repaired 2 more times out of warranty; each repair cost more than $300.00. The final disposition was a blown main board, which RCA doesn't have now. Couldn't find a repairman anywhere within 150 miles of Nashville who could find the board. I guess an RCA tv is now a mere "disposable" product after about a year. It's the worse TV I've ever owned. BUYER BEWARE!!!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: TV Pete
Reviews.Content: I have owned this tv for over 2 years now and have had none of the problems reviewed above...  I was extremely surprised to come across these reviews.  Only because I have used mine thoroughly and have had no signs of problems.  Only down side I can find about this tv is the retail price.  I am a satisfied customer.  I'm also curious if the other customers had the 720p model or 1080i?

ProductInfo.Name: RCA L46WD250 46-Inch LCD Scenium Flat HDTV
